func.title: Multi Function Sensors

case.description:
Description
A sensor that measures indicates whether a leak is currently detected, as well as whether a leak has been detected since last time the "Past Leak Detection Status" field was reset. Resetting the "Past Leak Detection" is accomplished by a button press or other method not covered by this EEP. .
Data exchange
Direction: from.
Addressing: broadcast.
Communication trigger: event_time_trigger.
Trigger description: Transmit on change of Leak Detection state and periodically..
Timing description: Periodically with a maximum period of 1000 seconds.

datafield.description: Indicates whether a leak is currently detected
Indicates whether a leak has been detected since last time this field was reset

type.title: Leak Detector with Temperature and Humidity Sensing

case.description:
Description
A sensor that measures indicates whether a leak is currently detected, as well as whether a leak has been detected since last time the "Past Leak Detection Status" field was reset. Resetting the "Past Leak Detection" is accomplished by a button press or other method not covered by this EEP. This sensor also reports temperature and relative humidity. .
Data exchange
Direction: from.
Addressing: broadcast.
Communication trigger: event_time_trigger.
Trigger description: Transmit on change of Leak Detection state and periodically..
Timing description: Periodically with a maximum period of 1000 seconds.

datafield.description: Indicates whether a leak is currently detected
Indicates whether a leak has been detected since last time this field was reset
